title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts. Conduct market research and analyze competitor offerings.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for AIFinancialAdvisor. This includes breaking down the task into smaller, manageable sub-tasks such as 'AI Model Selection', 'Data Storage and Processing Design', 'User Interface Design', 'Integration Points Definition', 'Security and Privacy Considerations', 'Scalability Plan', 'Performance Requirements Analysis', 'Web Accessibility Compliance', and 'Agile Development Plan'. Each sub-task will have a defined timeline with estimated completion dates to facilitate better planning and coordination within the team. Address each aspect thoroughly while considering scalability, security, performance requirements, data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA), web accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1), and ensuring alignment with project objectives. Outline the data storage and processing requirements using cloud solutions like AWS or Google Cloud, as well as the user interface and reporting components. Provide a detailed plan for developing, testing, and deploying the system, focusing on Agile methodologies for iterative development. Clarify dependency on 'Project Planning and Requirements Gathering'. Update the rfc_state field to 'IN_PROGRESS' as this task is ready for the code-architect or a suitable team member to begin working on it. Include a section on potential challenges and risks associated with each sub-task, along with proposed mitigation strategies to help in proactive risk management and ensure that the project stays on track. Update the rfc_state field to 'REVIEW_REQUIRED' as the suggested improvements need to be reviewed before moving forward.

title: Data Collection and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant financial data sources. Develop data preprocessing pipelines for cleaning, normalization, and feature engineering.

title: AI Model Development
description: Implement and train AI models for financial analysis, risk assessment, and recommendation generation based on the chosen algorithms and architectures.

title: User Interface Design for AIFinancialAdvisor
description: Design a user-friendly and intuitive interface for the financial advisor application. The UI should include dashboards, visualizations, and interactive features that allow users to input their financial information, goals, and risk profiles, and receive personalized recommendations and advice. Prioritize accessibility, responsiveness, modern design principles, adherence to industry standards and best practices for financial applications, and alignment with the overall system architecture and data models, considering future scalability and maintainability. Collaborate with the assigned frontend developer for implementation after completing the tasks listed as dependencies: System Architecture Design, User Research and Requirements Gathering, Data Modeling and Database Design. Upon completion of these dependencies, update the UI design in a way that can be easily handed over to the frontend developer for implementation. The UI design should include a clear plan for responsive design across various devices and screen sizes, and ensure compatibility with popular browsers. The design should also emphasize on providing a seamless user experience with a focus on usability and simplicity, and incorporate feedback from user research and requirements gathering to create a more personalized and effective interface. After the UI design is complete, share it with the frontend developer for implementation, and work together to make any necessary adjustments throughout the development process. Ensure that all updates to the UI design are documented and shared with relevant team members. If there are any concerns or questions about this RFC, please leave them in the review_comments field. Additionally, consider incorporating user feedback from existing financial advisory platforms for inspiration and improvement, and use tools like Figma or Sketch for UI design prototyping. To improve efficiency, I suggest creating interactive wireframes using Figma or Sketch that demonstrate functionality and interactions within the interface. This will help to communicate the design intent more effectively and allow for quicker feedback loops between the UI designer, frontend developer, and other stakeholders.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and integrations required for the financial advisor application, including data processing, AI model integration, and user management.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and frontend components based on the approved design, integrating with the backend services and APIs.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, data protection, and compliance with relevant financial regulations and privacy laws.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure the application meets quality standards and requirements.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring and logging systems.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and technical documentation. Establish user support channels and processes.
